snippet.title: Lion gameplay (PC Game, 1995)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Lion, Dos PC game produced by Sanctuary Woods in 1995 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/lion/5365/
Trying to survive a few days in the savannah, hunting and roaming around..
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Police Quest: SWAT - https://youtu.be/UfwyEhEwunk
Pinball Dreams 2 - https://youtu.be/Prv3ae_EdPU
Star Wars Chess - https://youtu.be/3kn6bNlER5k
